attributes.action: create legislation that makes all new build commercial and residential properties have at least 50% green roof or planted roof.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many benefits to green roofs that include - increased biodiversity, increased roof life, increased cooling and insulation effects in summer and winter, increased pshycological well being from more green space, improved air quality, reduction in carbon in atmosphere. Please search the internet for 'green roof' to find more info on this subject. By signing this petition you are helping to make a contribution to reduce the effects of global warming and to raise the awarness of the benefits of green roofing. Please tell your friends about this petition so they too can consider this option.
